Package uk.ac.kent.graph.drawers

Class GraphDrawer

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.kent.graph.drawers.GraphDrawer
Direct Known Subclasses:
GraphDrawerSpringEmbedder
public abstract class GraphDrawer extends Object
This is a way of passing graph drawing methods to the GraphPanel class. Any graph drawing algorithm should be implemented by extending this class and overloading the layout() method

The acceleratorKey is the key that when pressed in the GraphPanel calls the layout method.

  • Field Details

    • graphPanel

      protected GraphPanel graphPanel
      the associated GraphPanel

    • acceleratorKey

      protected int acceleratorKey
      the key that should be pressed to start the graph drawing method. Codes can be found in the KeyEvent class.

    • menuText

      protected String menuText
      the message that should appear in menu options to start the graph drawing method

    • mnemonicKey

      protected int mnemonicKey
      the menu mnemonic for initiating the layout. Codes can be found in the KeyEvent class.
